term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - air resource management in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: air resource management

item.text: The detailed planning and the implementation of air pollution control programs designed to preserve the health and welfare of the people in the region, the plant and animal life, physical property, good visibility and other factors which determine the air quality and the maintenance of an aesthetically acceptable environment.
